text:
Uber Elevate (Aviation) | Product, Eng, Design, more | SF + Palo Alto | Onsite | Full Time

Uber Elevate (uber.com/elevate) is building the future of urban aviation for transport of both people and food (Uber Eats). We're building an extensive airspace management platform and suite of software & tools to= deploy all-electric vertical takeoff and landing aircraft at scale in urban cores.

Contact me if you're interested: ngoel@uber.com
